body.name: ARZOPA Portable Monitor Kickstand, 14.0" Ultra Slim Portable Laptop Monitor FHD 1080P External Display with Dual Speakers Second Screen for Laptop PC Phone Xbox PS4/5 Switch-A1S
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 3 hrs 25 mins
features: [Slim, Light & Portable] Designed to be thin, slim, and lightweight, this portable monitor is only 0.16 inches thick and weighs 1.1 pounds. Its ultra-portable design makes it perfect for business trips or traveling.

[FHD 1080P Monitor] Enjoy a superb viewing experience with the 14.0" Full HD 1920 x 1080 anti-glare IPS display. With a 60Hz resolution, outstanding image quality, and high screen brightness, it delivers stunning visuals.

[2nd Monitor with 2 Modes] Enhance your work efficiency by using this portable laptop monitor as a second screen. It offers the flexibility to switch between horizontal and vertical modes, allowing you to choose the perspective that suits you best.

[Widely Compatible] Equipped with two fully functional USB Type-C connections and a Mini HDMI port, this monitor is compatible with laptops, PCs, Macs, smartphones, Xbox, PS5, Switch, Steam Deck, and more.

[Plug and Play Convenience] No need for apps or drivers. Simply connect the monitor with one USB-C cable for video signal and power. (Full-featured USB port required for phones). The built-in stand allows you to switch between landscape and portrait and adjust the angle of your sight to your liking.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SECOND MONITOR FOR YOUR LAPTOP Lightweight and portable, ideal for travel This portable monitor is designed to be thin, slim &light. It is only 0.16 inches thick and 1.1 pound in weight. Expand your productivity on the go. Collaborate with comfort and peace of mind Ready for collaboration, anywhere. Seamlessly work together with a 14" portable monitor designed for easy sharing and presenting.

The ultimate laptop companion Extend your screen at the office, at home or on the go with this convenient, compact display. Conveniently set up your monitor to the left, right or behind your laptop. The dual USB-C ports on each side allow for versatility and better portability. Magnify your game With the A1S portable monitor, escape a tiny screen to enjoy an enhanced console gaming experience anytime and anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lightweight, value monitor
reviews.reviewText: This laptop monitor works great. I am very used to working with two monitors and this is very lightweight, has great resolution and I just had to plug it in to my laptop to instantly work with two screens. Take it everywhere with me now as it adds literally no weight to my backpack. With type-c plug-in, can power using laptop or device (no outlet needed!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with this portable monitor
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the screen is great. I use this for gaming and I am happy with the overall quality. Easy to set up and portable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The ARZOPA MAX 17 is a great portable monitor for work or travel
reviews.reviewText: The ARZOPA Max 17 is lightweight, easy to use, and connects well , and without much effort , to multiple platforms, whether as a primary or extended secondary display. I use the ARZOPA MAX 17 alongside my 24-inch Lenovo monitor , and I especially appreciate that I can use just one cable to connect it to my Chromebook, Windows 11 laptop, or Mac.On the downside, the brightness settings don't save, so I have to adjust them every time I turn on the monitor. This can be annoying, especially in low-light conditions. The speakers are also pretty weak, so I wouldn't rely on them for watching videos or listening to music. Finally, the ARZOPA website could be improved. The technical support information is outdated, and the product lineup could be better organized.Overall, I'm happy with the ARZOPA Max 17 and would give it 4 out of 5 stars. It's a great option for a portable monitor, but just be aware of the few drawbacks I mentioned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Portable Screens
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these screens to bring with me when I travel. I use them as a dual monitor setup for my laptop when I’m working from a hotel. I like the flexibility to position the screens wherever i want versus them being attached to my laptop screens like other products. The size and clarity are perfect. They are powered by usb c connection. The mini hdmi cable works out perfect for allowing me to use the dual setup since my laptop only has one usb c connection. Overall i am very pleased with these screens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing, cost-effective portable monitor
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to extend my laptop screen for business purposes. It is an amazing little monitor that exceeded my expectations. Very light with great picture quality, has an adjustable stand, and is truly plug-and-play using the USB-C cable. Easily fits two Excel spreadsheets side-by-side allowing use of my laptop screen for other purposes. This monitor makes working from my laptop so much easier and efficient. I should have bought this device years ago!(Note, I have only used this once but so far it has exceeded my expectations!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Purchase I’ve ever made.
reviews.reviewText: I have a remote job that I can take anywhere, however, I always find myself at home because I don’t want to work off of just one screen.So, after looking into more expensive options, I decided to look for something that I didn’t even know existed. And that is this.You can also get a bigger screen, but I wanted something more for travel. It is the perfect size and works as a second screen. It’s easy to hook up and you literally just plug it in and it’s ready for you. 10/10 would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This monitor is pretty awesome so far, definitely fits my needs. The only thing I would suggest for improvement is to include some way of mounting it. However, the monitor is so light I was able to add four mounting bolts to the back of the monitor by purchasing a really inventive adhesive pad sticks to the back of the monitor. This gave me the ability to mount my monitor to a standard vesa mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely excellent for the price. I was worried as my laptop screen was broken and falling apart, and this has completely solved my problems. Works great straight out of the box and really sleek and good quality screen. Also EXTREMELY lightweight, great for travelling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I very rarely write reviews, but this is an absolute game changer and everyone should know about it!Due to a family member being unwell recently, I've been working away from home, basing myself in different relatives' spare rooms. This means I've been away from my usual set up and had been struggling to work on just my laptop. This week I got fed up after trying and failing to flick back and forth between spreadsheets and other programmes and decided I needed a second screen that I could move between spaces with. Found this and ordered, figuring anything would be better than nothing.Despite low expectations, this has blown me away. It was literally plug and play, the pass through charging means no excess cables (usb c power to screen, usb c connector from screen to laptop), and the screen itself is bright, clear and a fantastic size. My productivity has shot up, my frustration levels have dropped enormously, and it's a dream to just pack up and move as needed.Anyone who travels for work and is in need of a second screen whilst on the move would do well to get one of these. Absolutely brilliant bit of kit.
Using it with my Windows Surface Pro 8 as a second monitor for work, works great.

reviews.reviewTitle: Simply the most portable, most versatile monitor ever! Highly Recommended!
reviews.reviewText: WOW! What an amazing little monitor!!! This is one of my new favorite things! It’s super versatile with only 3 cables and no real power supply brick to worry about!! This is ingenious! It’s super slim and light weight. The stand is surprisingly sturdy and also versatile as it allows for Landscape and Portrait modes (with PC). The resolution, colour, contrast and volume are all at very high quality levels. Basically this is a thin laptop panel that powers from whatever you plug it into – including your phone!!!So no doubt this makes a super extra panel beside your laptop (or PC), but the best thing about this panel and speaking to its versatility, if you plug this directly into your (say Samsung S23 Ultra) phone or modern Android at least.. Android DEX fires right up, and gives you the ability to use your phone as a track pad!! WHAT!? I didn’t know this existed! But add a BT keyboard to that and you have a workstation based from you phone (and it only takes a USB-C cable). Yeah.. power it from your phone with perfect integration. I often watch videos while I work this monitor is a perfect size (14”) but thin and the most portable thing I’ve ever seen (coming from IT Industry that’s saying something)A good monitor will cost you some coin.. you mention portable the cost normally doubles.. I think this hits a really good mark of SUPER portable like nothing I’ve seen and a good price point for what it is and how it goes about it. I took one of my Playstations (4 in this case) and using a combo of USB and HDMI, it was perfect! Playstation only needs power (and WiFi) Monitor uses USB and HDMI.. no fuss no muss, just Awesome.I noticed that you can plug in a powerbank (battery) to power it and it charges the phone at the same time. Really.. really good engineering here. Very Highly Recommended. 5 Stars for sure! So you don’t need to eat your phone battery completely. AMAZING PRODUCT!
